00148 
00149 inline void
00150 MapFilterUtil::initMapGfxDistances()
00151 {
00152    // filterDist = 1, MAX( (int)(filterDist * 2.5), filterDist + 1 )
00153    //   1 2 5 12 30 75 187 467 1167 2917 7292 18230 45575 113937 284842
00154    //
00155    // filterDist = int( pow(level, 2) * 0.7 * pow(1.6, 0.92 * level) )
00156    //   1 6 23 63 152 337 707 1424 2777 5284 9853 18069 32678 58400 103308
00157    //
00158    // filterDist = int( pow(level, 2) * 0.8 * pow(1.6, 0.89 * level) )
00159    //   1 7 25 68 161 354 732 1454 2796 5245 9642 17436 31091 54787 95559
00160    
00161    int filterDist;
00162    for( int level = 1; level < 16; level++ ) {
00163       filterDist = int( pow(double(level), 2) * 0.8 * pow(1.6, 0.89 * level) );
00164       m_mapGfxFilterDistances.push_back( filterDist );
00165    }
00166    m_mapGfxDistDefined = true;
00167 }
00168 
00169 inline void
00170 MapFilterUtil::initAreaItemDistances( int minAreaFilterDistance )
00171 {
00172    // filterDist = 1, MAX( (int)(filterDist * 2.5), filterDist + 1 )
00173    //                 MAX( filterDist, minAreaFilterDistance * level )
00174    //                 minAreaFilterDistance = 3
00175    //   3 6 9 12 30 75 187 467 1167 2917 7292 18230 45575 113937 284842
00176    //
00177    // filterDist = int( pow(level, 2) * 0.8 * pow(1.6, 0.89 * level) )
00178    //   1 7 25 68 161 354 732 1454 2796 5245 9642 17436 31091 54787 95559
00179    
00180    int filterDist;
00181    for( int level = 1; level < 16; level++ ) {
00182       filterDist = int( pow(double(level), 2) * 0.8 * pow(1.6, 0.89 * level) );
00183       if ( minAreaFilterDistance > -1 ) {
00184          filterDist = MAX( filterDist, minAreaFilterDistance*level );
00185       }
00186       m_areaItemFilterDistances.push_back( filterDist );
00187    }
00188    m_areaItemDistDefined = true;
00189 }
00190 
00191 inline void
00192 MapFilterUtil::initLineItemDistances( int minLineFilterDistance )
00193 {
00194    // filterDist = 1, MAX( (int)(filterDist * 2.0), filterDist + 1 )
00195    //                 MAX( filterDist, minLineFilterDistance * level )
00196    //                 minLineFilterDistance 1 meter, co-map: 50 meters
00197    //   1 2 4 8 16 32 64 128 256 512 1024 2048 4096 8192 16384
00198    //   50 100 150 200 250 300 350 400 450 512 1024 2048 4096 8192 16384
00199    //
00200    // filterDist = int( pow(level, 2) * 0.8 * pow(1.6, 0.89 * level) )
00201    //   1 7 25 68 161 354 732 1454 2796 5245 9642 17436 31091 54787 95559
00202    
00203    int filterDist;
00204    for( int level = 1; level < 16; level++ ) {
00205       filterDist = int( pow(double(level), 2) * 0.8 * pow(1.6, 0.89 * level) );
00206       if ( minLineFilterDistance > -1 ) {
00207          filterDist = MAX( filterDist, minLineFilterDistance*level );
00208       }
00209       m_lineItemFilterDistances.push_back( filterDist );
00210    }
00211    m_lineItemDistDefined = true;
00212 }
00213 
00214 inline int
00215 MapFilterUtil::getFiltDistanceForMapGfx( uint32 level )
00216 {
00217    if ( level > 15 ) {
00218       // invalid level
00219       return 0;
00220    }
00221 
00222    // make sure that the vector with map gfx data distances
00223    // m_mapGfxFilterDistances is initialised
00224    if ( ! m_mapGfxDistDefined ) {
00225       initMapGfxDistances();
00226    }
00227 
00228    // filt level 0 is no filtering,
00229    if ( level <= 0 ) {
00230       return 0;
00231    }
00232    
00233    // filt level 1 is first filtering, i.e. index 0 in the vector
00234    uint32 vectorIdx = level - 1;
00235    return ( m_mapGfxFilterDistances[ vectorIdx ] );
00236 }
00237 
00238 inline int
00239 MapFilterUtil::getFiltDistanceForAreaItem(
00240                uint32 level, int minAreaFilterDistance )
00241 {
00242    if ( level > 15 ) {
00243       // invalid level
00244       return 0;
00245    }
00246 
00247    // make sure that the vector with area item distances
00248    // m_areaItemFilterDistances is initialised
00249    if ( ! m_areaItemDistDefined ) {
00250       initAreaItemDistances( minAreaFilterDistance );
00251    }
00252 
00253    // filt level 0 is no filtering,
00254    if ( level <= 0 ) {
00255       return 0;
00256    }
00257    
00258    // filt level 1 is first filtering, i.e. index 0 in the vector
00259    uint32 vectorIdx = level - 1;
00260    return ( m_areaItemFilterDistances[ vectorIdx ] );
00261 }
00262 
00263 inline int
00264 MapFilterUtil::getFiltDistanceForLineItem(
00265                uint32 level, int minLineFilterDistance )
00266 {
00267    if ( level > 15 ) {
00268       // invalid level
00269       return 0;
00270    }
00271 
00272    // make sure that the vector with line item distances
00273    // m_lineItemFilterDistances is initialised
00274    if ( ! m_lineItemDistDefined ) {
00275       initLineItemDistances( minLineFilterDistance );
00276    }
00277 
00278    // filt level 0 is no filtering,
00279    if ( level <= 0 ) {
00280       return 0;
00281    }
00282    
00283    // filt level 1 is first filtering, i.e. index 0 in the vector
00284    uint32 vectorIdx = level - 1;
00285    return ( m_lineItemFilterDistances[ vectorIdx ] );
00286 }
